replies.body:
I feel like, the best way to nerf Katarina, is to do something about her ult's design.

**AT THE MOMENT** I feel like her biggest problem, is that the damage on her ult hits like a %%%%ing train, STRAIGHT AWAY. People will never stress this enough "Just Hard CC her when she ults man, you're such a n00b". This is true, but half your health is gone before you cancel her channeling and that is what I feel like needs to be fixed.

Change her ult so it she stands still while channeling the damage for idk 1 second or 1.5 seconds after which all the damage follows. And her channeling, a little more obvious...

1 tick is only 75+ 25% AP (and lets be honest, you don't build all that much AP it's mostly pen.)

If your losing half your health, then that's cause she's Q > ulting, and then it's her Q doing the damage not her ult.

Are you sure? I remember playing Kat once and the AP ratio part of my ult damage was in the 4 digits... I might be wrong, but I'm pretty sure the scaling on it is hugeee.

And well if that's case, my solution should still work. If you can CC her during her ult channel, then that means she can't proc her secondary Q damage in the first place.

Edit: Sorry, just checked, you are correct. 25% it is. The 4 digits I mentioned must've been the maximum damage of the ult. But yeah, her Q will normally hit everyone and then the Ult itself will proc the Q on all the other targets.

Plus a lot of her burst come from before her ult when she throws a dagger in, jumps on you and Ws. Hard to target a target who teleports.
And that %%%%ing Shunpo is another thing, it basically a free skillshot dodge. Talon has one too yes but his doesn't reset, is on a longer cooldown, doesn't do damage and he isn't OP.
Its not even a nerf, all her resets happen well within 3 seconds, she needs a proper nerf.
I seriously agree. Even if it's not a numbers nerf, just give her more counterplay
